citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats.
citations.narrative:
One female dog escaped during transport . The dog was not contained in a transport crate , carton or crate during
transport and escaped when removed from the vehicle. The dog was later recaptured. Containing an animal during
transport provides for a safe environment and prevents escape. Dogs and cats must be contained in a primary enclosure
during transport.
CORRECTED AT TIME OF INSPECTION
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant .
End Section

narrative:
3.15(a) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats. 
One female dog escaped during transport . The dog was not contained in a transport crate , carton or crate during 
transport and escaped when removed from the vehicle. The dog was later recaptured. Containing an animal during 
transport provides for a safe environment and prevents escape. Dogs and cats must be contained in a primary enclosure 
during transport. 
CORRECTED AT TIME OF INSPECTION 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant . 
 
End Section
